root.name: Telepath RPG: Servants of God
root.description: Telepath RPG: Servants of God focuses on the story of young Duvalier, the son of two senators in the desert city-state of Ravinale. After a religious group gains control of Ravinale's military and overthrows the republic, Duvalier and his parents are jailed. He escapes and soon falls in with a fledgling resistance group, where he is asked to serve as a tactician due to his exceptional telepathic abilities.The game centers around turn-based tactical battles and branching dialog. To win, the player must both succeed in battle and succeed in garnering the support of various factions. The game ends when the player has established a viable army and successfully retakes the city from the theocrats.The game was released for Windows, Mac and Linux on February 14, 2012.
